title: Why not add some Lethality boots?
body: If you want armour and protection from autos you get Ninja's, If you need MR and some tenacity for the CC you get Merc's, If you need magic penetration to deal more magic dmg you get Sorc's, but if you need lethality to deal more physical DMG there are no AD boot options presides Berserker greaves but not all champs like Panth, Zed, Renekton want attack speed boots. I don't think it would be a bad idea to test, Just to give some more freedom of choice when it comes to one of the core items in League as every champ Except Cass needs boots :3
